content.heading: <summary> Tag
paragraphs: The <summary> tag defines a heading for <details>.

Example:
Epcot Center

Epcot is a theme park at Walt Disney World.

content.heading: Definition and Usage
paragraphs: Must be the first child of <details>.

content.heading: Browser Support
paragraphs: Supported since Chrome 12, Edge 79, Firefox 49, Safari 6, Opera 15.

content.heading: Examples
paragraphs:
Styled:
Epcot Center

Epcot is a theme park.
